name: Sand (babs)
description:
SAND

Little "game" that is not actually much of a game, because it is more like putting sand in a container while talking with a cat guy in a small room.

Made in a day or two for fun. (I stayed up 24 hours because I was making this). 

NOTES

If you just want to read the different dialogue without taking up too much time, you can spam click the sand instead of actually picking it up.

The tab is supposed to close when you walk out the door, which was working at first, and then it stopped working for me even though I did not change anything. Oddly enough, it works for most of my friends though. I have no idea how to fix that. If it doesn't work for you, just pretend it does.

THINGS TO ADD
  • Save system 
  • Varied BGM
  • Small piano/keyboard to play around with 
  • Customizable sand color
  • Painting on wall
  • ...Random Muffled Crying SFX..???
  • Custom icon (for downloadable version) (I will do this after adding all the changes above, though)
